overview: Ian Halifax brings more than twenty years of global finance experience to Wind River. As senior vice president of finance and administration, and chief financial officer, Halifax oversees all aspects of finance and accounting, including strategic financial planning and analysis, tax, treasury, investor relations and legal affairs. From January 2005 through February 2006, Halifax was chief financial officer of Micromuse, Inc., a provider of business and service assurance solutions to telecommunications companies, financial organizations and governmental institutions, where he oversaw revenue growth of $50 million in just over two years. Following IBMâ€™s acquisition of Micromuse in February 2006, Halifax served as a transition executive in IBMâ€™s Tivoli Software unit. Prior to his tenure with Micromuse, he spent over five years at Macrovision Corporation. Halifax also has held numerous finance positions at technology companies including Sun Microsystems and OpenTV, Inc. Mr. Halifax is a certified public accountant and a certified management accountant.
